comment.author: 62508825@N00
comment._content: E Adams Record Year 1910 Rank Private Unit Somerset Light Infantry Embert John Adams Record Year 1918 Rank Private Unit Somerset Light Infantry Ernest Albert Adams Record Year 1918 Rank Private Unit Somerset Light Infantry www.forces-war-records.co.uk/ There are many named Ernest Albert Adams including Ernest Albert Adams birth recorded 1st qr 1893 in Wellington Somerset. www.freebmd.co.uk

comment.author: 62508825@N00
comment._content: Ernest Albert Adams gazetted 26 July 1918 T./ 2nd Lt. Ernest Albert Adams, R. Lanc. R. For conspicuous gallantry and devotion to duty. When in charge of the defensive line near battalion headquarters both flanks were turned, and the line had to withdraw. He formed a block and got a Lewis gun into action, successfully carrying out a critical withdrawal. Later, he rendered valuable assistance in holding a back line. www.london-gazette.co.uk/issues/30813/supplements/8769/pa...
